overview_summary: None of the three profiled neighbors have a documented public stance on development or clean energy projects, with each classified as "unknown" in their viewpoint. All appear to be private landowners without notable public offices or leadership roles, indicating low community influence across the board.

neighbors.name: Loren Sheldon
neighbors.claims: Loren Sheldon owns property in Cochise County (parcel #106-06-025F) according to county records ([www.cochise.az.gov](https://www.cochise.az.gov/498/Recorder#:~:text=The%20County%20Recorder%20performs%20two,related%20responsibilities%20as%20statutorily%20required)) ([www.cochise.az.gov](https://www.cochise.az.gov/635/Public-Document-Search#:~:text=Search)). He is not listed in Cochise County’s public conflict-of-interest or financial disclosure archives, indicating he has held no county public office ([cochise.az.gov](https://cochise.az.gov/Archive.aspx#:~:text=Select%20an%20Item%20All%20Archive,Ward%2C%20Trevor%20Financial%20Disclosure%20Statement)). No references to any public comments or civic activities by Sheldon were found in local news or meeting records as of this research ([saddlebagnotes.com](https://saddlebagnotes.com/news/local/article_3030c105-5b22-5ceb-83af-8ea985fd6dc0.html#:~:text=The%20conflict%20erupted%20recently%20at,trying%20to%20protect%20the%20aquifer)) ([saddlebagnotes.com](https://saddlebagnotes.com/news/local/article_3030c105-5b22-5ceb-83af-8ea985fd6dc0.html#:~:text=growers%20who%20plan%20to%20expand%2C,trying%20to%20protect%20the%20aquifer)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach one-on-one through a neutral, personable outreach, focusing on listening to any concerns. Emphasize transparency and willingness to address issues like property impact or water use that may matter to him.

neighbors.name: Jason Leigh Shepherd & Meshell Denise Shepherd
neighbors.claims: Jason and Meshell Shepherd jointly own a parcel in Cochise County (APN 106-06-025D) per the county property records ([www.cochise.az.gov](https://www.cochise.az.gov/498/Recorder#:~:text=The%20County%20Recorder%20performs%20two,related%20responsibilities%20as%20statutorily%20required)) ([www.cochise.az.gov](https://www.cochise.az.gov/635/Public-Document-Search#:~:text=Search)). Neither Jason nor Meshell appears in county archives of elected officials or board appointees, implying they have no formal role in local government ([cochise.az.gov](https://cochise.az.gov/Archive.aspx#:~:text=Select%20an%20Item%20All%20Archive,Ward%2C%20Trevor%20Financial%20Disclosure%20Statement)). No public statements or letters by the Shepherds on development or energy issues were found in local media or civic records as of the retrieval date ([saddlebagnotes.com](https://saddlebagnotes.com/news/local/article_3030c105-5b22-5ceb-83af-8ea985fd6dc0.html#:~:text=The%20conflict%20erupted%20recently%20at,trying%20to%20protect%20the%20aquifer)) ([saddlebagnotes.com](https://saddlebagnotes.com/news/local/article_3030c105-5b22-5ceb-83af-8ea985fd6dc0.html#:~:text=growers%20who%20plan%20to%20expand%2C,trying%20to%20protect%20the%20aquifer)).
neighbors.influence_justification: No known civic positions or advocacy

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage this couple through personal outreach by a respected community liaison. In conversation, invite them to share any concerns and highlight practical benefits or assurances relevant to rural homeowners.

neighbors.name: Melanie A. Fiorucci
neighbors.claims: Melanie A. Fiorucci is listed as the owner of a Cochise County parcel (APN 106-03-039F) in local property records ([www.cochise.az.gov](https://www.cochise.az.gov/498/Recorder#:~:text=The%20County%20Recorder%20performs%20two,related%20responsibilities%20as%20statutorily%20required)) ([www.cochise.az.gov](https://www.cochise.az.gov/635/Public-Document-Search#:~:text=Search)). She does not show up in county filings for financial disclosures or conflict-of-interest, signaling no involvement in official capacities ([cochise.az.gov](https://cochise.az.gov/Archive.aspx#:~:text=Select%20an%20Item%20All%20Archive,Ward%2C%20Trevor%20Financial%20Disclosure%20Statement)). There is no public record of Fiorucci voicing opinions on development or renewable energy projects in the community, and her public profile appears minimal ([saddlebagnotes.com](https://saddlebagnotes.com/news/local/article_3030c105-5b22-5ceb-83af-8ea985fd6dc0.html#:~:text=The%20conflict%20erupted%20recently%20at,trying%20to%20protect%20the%20aquifer)) ([saddlebagnotes.com](https://saddlebagnotes.com/news/local/article_3030c105-5b22-5ceb-83af-8ea985fd6dc0.html#:~:text=growers%20who%20plan%20to%20expand%2C,trying%20to%20protect%20the%20aquifer)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private citizen with no public profile

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out in a low-pressure, friendly manner—perhaps via a mutual acquaintance or community meeting—to build trust. Since her views are not publicly known, ask open-ended questions about her priorities and address key local topics (e.g., land use or property values) as needed.
